name: TinyClock
short_description:
Tiny Clock is a small desktop application that will display the time, date, and weather of any given zip code.  The application background transparency can be changed and the screen position and level can be locked.

More information about the current weather can be found by hovering over the weather image.  Additionally high and low temperatures can be found by hovering over the displayed temperature.

Update 1 Notes:
Fixes a definition error that lists August and July as month 7.  I didn't notice this in July and just got round to fixing it.

Known Issue - 
The application will crash if it tries to update the weather without an internet connection.  I will resolve this as soon as I have time.

Credits - 
The application icon was created by xiao4 at deviantART. (http://xiao4.deviantart.com/)

The current weather icons were created by LavAna at deviantART. (http://lavana.deviantart.com/)

**Please rate and review my project. Feedback will be appreciated!**
summary: Small desktop clock with time, date, and weather.
